  <HelloWorld/>
  <HeaderBlock/>
</template>

<script>
import HeaderBlock from './components/HeaderBlock.vue'

  name: 'App',
  components: {

  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Open sans-serif;
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, #0e031d 0%, #2c146b 100%);
}
@font-face{
    font-family: Open sans-serif;
    src: url("./components/OpenSans-VariableFont_wdth,wght.ttf")
}
html{
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #0e031d 0%, #2c146b 100%);
    color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    font-family: Open sans-serif;
    font-weight: 400;
    width: 100%; 
}
*, *::before, *::after{
    box-sizing: inherit;
}
body{
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
a{
    text-decoration: none;
    color: white;
    font-size: 12px;
}
h1{
    font-size: 18px;
}
h2{
    font-size: 16px;
}
h3{
    font-size: 8px;
}
.wrapper{
    width: 1200px;
    height: auto;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
</style>
